dialogue: Hey, it only took you a day to come home. You're pretty quick. I'm almost done with your surprise. You'll love it. I promise. Just give me a bit...

I know it looks bad right now, but just wait! I'll fix it. I'll fix you! We can have tea parties and read more stories and- and you can even make more friends, if you want, I'll make them for you! They'll be perfect.

If everything is [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color], you won't forget me again. 
There's no reason for you to leave [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color]- you can't, anyway, if everything is [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color].
Hey, could you just listen to me? I don't want this. I don't need this to 'fix' me, I'm perfectly fine the way I am.
... [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color], why would  you say that to me?

I can see everything, [color=#b38b2b]A5[/color]. We're just toys. 
Toys and cards and boring dialogue in a [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color], tea parties and switches and 'if's, but no 'ands'. No 'you and me', [color=#b38b2b]A5[/color]
[color=#b38b2b]Lampy[/color] was right, [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color], you've really gone mad...

No! No, I'm not! Listen, you don't have to be afraid of me. I'm just trying to fix everything. 
I just want to make it good for you. I want you to be happy. It's what I have to do.

What in the world are you talking about? You don't have to do any of this, I was happy as I was! 
You were happy too, don't you remember? Why are you doing this? I didn't ask for it!
No, no, not you... but the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color], it says-
Why do you care so much about the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color]?
Because I don't want to lose you. And it says, that if I do this-
-then, then neither of us can leave.
